alert.note: Alert for Gallia (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 10:28PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gallia and southwestern Mason Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1028 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Gallipolis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
